SENT.plain: The small bowel is essential to sustain alimentation and small bowel Crohn's disease (CD) may severely limit its function
Small bowel imaging is a crucial element in diagnosing small bowel CD, and treatment control with imaging is increasingly used to optimize the patients outcome
Thereby, capsule endoscopy, Balloon-assisted enteroscopy, and Magnetic resonance imaging have become key players to manage CD patients
In this review, role of small bowel imaging is detailed discussed for use in diagnosing and managing Crohn's disease patients
